quote: Don't worry! It isn't as bad as you sometimes think it is. It all works out in the end. Put your trust in God and move forward with faith and the confidence in the future. The Lord will not forsake us
author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quote: I promise you that one day, you will stand aside and look at your difficult times, you will realized that He was always there beside you
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Don't you give up! Don't you quit! You keep Walking! You keep trying! There is help and happiness ahead...It will be all right in the end. Trust God and belive in good things to come
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: Endure and save yourself for days of happiness ahead
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: When life is hard, remember - we are not the first to ask, 'Is there no other way?'
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: We are infinitely more than our limitations of our afflictions
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: We are not measured by the trials that we meet, only by those that we overcome
author: Spencer W. Kimball

quote: With celestial sight, trials impossible to change become possible to endure
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Often the prickly thorn produces tender roses
author: Old Latin saying

quote: Remember, the flak is always the heaviest closer to the target.
author: Leon Packer

quote: Every tear today will eventually be returned a hundredfold with tears of rejoicing and gratitude.
author: Joseph B. Worthlin

quote: Come what may, and love it.
author: Joseph B. Worthlin

quote: No misfortune is so bad that whining about it won 't make it worse
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you do your best, it will all work out.Put your trust in God. …The Lord will not forsake us.
author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quote: Every experience God gives us, every person He puts in our lives is the perfect preparation for a future that only He can see.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: As a gem cannot be polished without friction, neither can a man be perfected without trials.
author: Confucius

quote: Patiently enduring some things is part of our mortal education
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: How much of life do we miss by waiting to see the rainbow begfore thanking God for the rain.
author: Dieter F.Uchtdorf

quote: Be still and know that I am God.
author: Psalm 46:10

quote: For with God, nothing shall be impossible.
author: Luke 18:27

quote: In three words, I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
author: African Proverb

quote: Those things that hurt, instruct. It is for this reason that wise people learn not to dread but welcome problems.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If you are on the right path, it will always be uphill.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: Good timber does not grow with ease. the stronger the wind, the stronger the trees.
author: Douglas Malloch

quote: Challenges help us become more like our Father in Heaven.
author: Richard G. Scott

quote: One Gift of God is the joy of trying again, for no failure ever need be final.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Everything in the gospel teaches us that we can change if we need to, that we can be hleped if we truly want it, that we can be made whole, whatever the problems of the past.
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: Healing comes when we choose ot walk away from darkness and move towards a brighter light.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: I will stand with anyone when he stands right and I will part from him when he goes wrong.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The Greatest filter in the world is your personal testimony of Christ's Atonement
author: Linda S. Reeves

quote: I testify to you that your body, mind and spirit can be transformed, cleansed, and made whole, and you will be freed.
author: M. Russell Ballard

quote: Because of Jesus Christ, peace can replace guilt
author: M. Russell Ballard

quote: God loves you this very day and always.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Whatever you do, never run back to what broke you
author: Frank Oscar

quote: Oh Yes, the past can hurt, but the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it
author: Rafiki (from the Lion King)

quote: Addiction surrenders later freedom to choose. Through chemical means, one can literally become disconnected from his or her own will.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: A religion that does not require the sacrifice of all things never has power sufficient to produce the faith neccesary unto life and salvation
author: Joseph Smith

quote: It is important to rise above rationalizations and make the best choices.
author: Quinten L. Cook

quote: By choosing our path, we choose our destination
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: A man without a purpose is like a ship without a rudder, never likely to reach home port
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: What we are hereafter depends on what we're after here.
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: Evil comes from the abuse of free will.
author: C.S.Lewis

quote: There is no neutral ground in the universe.Every square inch, every split second, is claimed by God and Counterclaimed by the Devil.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues. Rather, it is the form of every virtue at the testing point
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Be the same person you are in the dark that you are in the light.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Adam fell that men might be and men are that they might have joy
author: 2 Nephi 2:25

quote: Agency is your power to become...
author: Randall L. Ridd

quote: Blame keeps wounds open. Only forgiveness heals.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The Atonement of Jesus Christ makes the Savior’s invitation to “be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect” perfectly possible rather than frustratingly out of reach.
author: Allen D. Haynie

quote: Christ doesn't make up the difference. Christ makes ALL the difference.
author: Brad Wilcox

quote: it is better to prepare and prevent than to repair and repent.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: We all want progress, but if you're on the wrong road, progress means doing about-turnand walking back to the righyt road; in that case, the man who turns back soonest is the most progressive.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Now is the best time to start to become the person you want to be
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Whatever the cost of repentance, it is swallowed up in the joy of forgiveness
author: D. Todd Christofferson

quote: Guilt is to the spirit, what pain is to the body.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: The truth is that today is always a better day to repent than any tomorrow.
author: Henry B. Eyring

quote: The guilt that accompanies mistakes can be washed away.
author: Boyd K. Packer

quote: With God, there is no point of no return
author: Robert D. Hales

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small is ever wasted
author: Aesop

quote: Love is the thing that will unlock every heart
author: Broc Hiatt

quote: To effectively serve others, we must see them through a parent's eyes, through Heavenly Father's eyes.
author: Dale G. Renlund

quote: With compassion and forbearance, it replaces the retaliatory reactions of “an eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth.” If we were to stay on that old and unproductive path, we would be but blind and toothless.
author: Fiddler on the Roof

quote: When one is in possession of absolute truth, it is imperative to love
author: Mahatma Ghandi

quote: There is no more tender and beautiful picture in all of sacred writing than this simple language describing the love of the Savior for little children.
author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quote: A life can never be happy that is focused inward. So if you are miserable now, forget your troubles. March right out your door, and find someone who needs you.
author: Robert L. Backman

quote: They do not love that do not show their love.
author: Shakespeare

quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Have the courage to be a light for others to follow
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Being sincerely christlike is an even more important goal than being authentic
author: Quinten L. Cook

quote: Choose your love. Love your choice.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Love is unselfishly choosing for another's highest good.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: None of us marry perfection, we marry potential.
author: Robert D. Hales

quote: Will this person in this relationship lead to the temple?
author: Elaine S. Dalton

quote: Wisdom will come as we listen to learn
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Love is making space in your life for someone else.
author: Neill F. Marriott

quote: Don't just pray to marry the one you love; instead, pray to love the one you marry
author: Spencer W. Kimball

quote: Believe that faith has everything to do with your romance-- Because it does!
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: True love is not something you fall in, but grow in.
author: Lynn G. Robbins

quote: You don't have a soul. You are a soul. You have a body.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Be Loyal to the royal within you, for you are the child of a king
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: Heaven isn't a prize for the perfect, but the future home of those who are willing to be perfected.
author: Brad Wilcox

quote: Our Heavenly Father wants us to succeed because really, after all, they were His children before they were ours.
author: Bradley D. Foster

quote: The son of God became a man to enable men to become the sons of God.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Be Loyal to the royal within you.
author: Elaine S. Dalton

quote: God cares a lot more about who we are and who we are becoming than about who we once were.
author: Dale G. Renlund

quote: We are now living part of eternity.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Each of us is entitled to the inspiration of the Lord in proportion to the manner in which we live a godly life.
author: George Albert Smith

quote: “I cannot do what you ask, for I was born to be a king.”
author: King Louis XVI

quote: Prayer is the infinite in man seeking the infinite in God
author: LeGrand Richards

quote: In God’s ecology, talent and love are never wasted.
author: Neal A Maxwell

quote: Don't spend time focused on climbing a mountain only to discover you have climbed the wrong one.
author: Randall L. Ridd

quote: The divine nature within us ignites our desire to reach out to others and prompts us to act.
author: Rosemary M. Wixom

quote: Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
author: Tagore

quote: Remember the past; learn from it. Contemplate the future; prepare for it. Live in the present; serve in it.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: When we treat people merely as they are, they will remain as they are. When we treat them as if they were what they should be, they will become what they should be.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: If you live close to God and His infinite grace--you won’t have to tell, it will show in your face.
author: Unknown

quote: The worth of a human soul is its capacity to become as God.
author: Unknown

quote: We are not mortal bodies having spiritual experiences, rather, we are having mortal experiences in a spiritual body
author: Unknown

quote: Who touches a boy by the Master’s plan is shaping the course of a future man.
author: Unknown

quote: The gospel of Jesus Christ opens the path to what we may become
author: D. Todd Christofferson

quote: You can achieve what you belive you can. trust and believe and have faith.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The Lord can only teach an inquiring mind.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Man has never discovered anything that God has not already known.
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: My rule now is, never read anything that is not worth remembering.
author: J. Reuben Clark

quote: Humility, faith, and the influence of the Holy Spirit [will] always be elements of every quest for truth.
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: He will increase your opportunities, expand your vision, and then strengthen you.
author: Gary E. Stevenson

quote: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Knowledge is power, and the man with the most knowledge has the greatest power.
author: Joseph Smith

quote: No one likes to fail…but we mortals do not becoome champions without making mistakes.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Education is the difference between wishing you could help other people and being able to help them.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Questions are an indication of a further desire to learn, to add to those truths already in place in our testimonies.
author: Ronald A. Rasband

quote: There is no obstacle too great, no challenge too difficult, if we have faith
author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quote: Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Search inward, reach outward, look heavenward.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Our Responsibility is to become the best disciples of Jesus Christ that we can become.
author: Kiersten M. Oaks

quote: We must live by faith and not by fear.
author: Quinten L. Cook

quote: Faith and hope invite into our lives the sweet peace of conscience for which we all yearn.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: Strong Faith in the Savior is submissively accepting of His will and timing in our lives, even if the outcome is not what we had hoped for or wanted
author: David A. Bednar

quote: Faith is the antidote of Fear
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Be of good cheer. The future is as bright as your faith.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Believe in miracles. ...Hope is NEVER lost.
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: I believe in Christianity as i believe that the sun has risen, not only because i see it, but because by it, i see everything else.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Faith is trust. Trust that God sees what we cannot, and that He knows what we do not.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Doubt your dubts befor you doubt your faith.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Your fath will grow not by chance, but by choice.
author: Neil L. Andersen

quote: True conversion is a process that takes place over a period of time and involves a willingness to excersise faith.
author: Bonnie L. Oscarson

quote: No other work trancends that of rightous, intentional parenting.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Choose a field that will supply sufficient remuneration to provide adequately for your companion and your children. I bear testimony that these criteria are very important in choosing your life's work.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird. It would be a jolly sight harder for a bird to learn to fly whilre remaining an egg. We are like eggs at present and you cannot go on indefinitely being just an ordinary decent egg. We must be hatched or go bad
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Marriage is the most trusting step in any human relationship. it is a real act of faith. THe very nature of the endeavor requires that you hold on to each other ass tightly as you can and jump
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: Great marriages are built brick by brick, day after day, over a lifetime
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: No other sucess can compensate for failure in the home
author: David O. McKay

quote: Parents may tell but never teach until they practice what they preach
author: St. Francis of Assisi

quote: There is no greater university than that of being married and having a family to teach us of God's love for His children.
author: Randall L. Ridd

quote: Immersing our families in the spirit will keep our children's hearts open to His influence.
author: Mary R. Durham

quote: What matters most is what lasts the longest
author: M. Russell Ballard

quote: Perhaps the most essential of a father's work is to turn the hearts of his children to their Heavenly Father
author: D. Todd Christofferson

quote: The trick is to enjoy life. don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinkley

quote: Happiness does not depend on what happens outside of you but on what happens inside of you; it is measured by the spirit with which you meet the problems of life
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: Missionary work is not easy because salvation is not a cheap experience.
author: Jeffery R. Holland

quote: When obedience ceases to be an irritant, in that moment,  God will endow us with power.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: …[T]hus hath the Lord commanded me, and I must obey
author: 2 Nephi 33:15

quote: Let us walk in the light of the Lord
author: Isaiah 2:5

quote: The more we devote ourselves to the pursuit of holiness and happiness, the less likely we will be on a path to regrets
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: The most important of all the commandments of God is that one that you are having the most difficulty keeping today.
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: you can't be right by doing wrong and you can't be wrong by doing right.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Sin, even if legalized is still Sin in the eyes of God.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: The surest step towards joy in the morning is virtue in the evening
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Each day is a decision and our decisions determine ourdestiny.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: As you choose to live on the Lord's side, you are never alone
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Those who are obedient to the Lord's commandments and who faithfully observe the word of wisdom are promised particular blessings.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The Word of Wisdom does not promise you perfect health, but it teaches how to keep the body you were born with in the best condition and your mind alert to the delicate spiritual promptings
author: Boyd K. Packer

quote: Faithfulness in obeying the commandments and keeping our covenants will protect us from being deceived.
author: Robert D. Hales

quote: Life is Fragile, Handle with Prayer
author: Harold B. Lee

quote: A small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: [I]f a sparrow cannot fall to the ground without God’s knowledge, ‘can an empire rise without his aid?'
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Laughing at our mistakes can lengthen our own life. Laughing at someone else’s can shorten it.
author: Cullen Hightower

quote: A wise man knows when to shut up
author: David Johanson

quote: Tell a man there are trillions of stars in the universe, and he’ll believe you. Tell him there’s wet paint on the wall, and he’ll touch it just to be sure.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: O be wise! What can I say more?
author: Jacob 6:12

quote: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him
author: James 1:5)

quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistiation
author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quote: Sometimes, I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Good is the enemy of best
author: Lynn G. Robbins

quote: If the lessons of history teach us anything it is that nobody learns the lessons that history teaches us.
author: Unknown

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: Gordon B. Hinkley

quote: When it comes to hating, gossiping, ignoring, ridiculing, holding grudges, or wanting to cause harm, please apply the following: STOP IT!
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
